metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7258 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in web2ldap 1.1.x before 1.1.49 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors related to "displaying group DN and entry data in group administration UI."

criterions.comment: web2ldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
